content: the forever hug plush heart amigurumi crochet toy pattern © the forever hug plush shop 2025 all rights reserved abbreviations st = stitch increase = increase one into next r= round sts = stitches stitch the forever hug heart magic_ring = magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet decrease = invisible decrease one notes on splitting the round when making the heart you will be splitting the round into two separate rounds of an equal amount of stitches in this case 18 stitches per round to begin splitting the round count back 18 stitches from your hook including your working loop cross the round and single_crochet into the right side of that stitch complete the instructions for the first smaller round and once done rejoin yarn into the next stitch of the larger original round the stitch that would have been worked next had you not split the round finish the instructions to complete the heart with the remaining 18 stitches in the larger original round the heart using a 4 mm hook and worsted weight yarn in red or the color of your choosing create magic_ring single_crochet 6 into ring then r1 single_crochet 6 sts 6 r2 single_crochet 1 increase 3 times 9 note you can begin stuffing your heart when you finish your first r3 single_crochet 1 increase single_crochet 1 3 times 12 smaller round finish stuffing before sewing up the final 6 sts of r4 single_crochet 3 increase 3 times 15 your second smaller round tip use the end of a pencil or something r5 single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 2 3 times 18 similar to work the stuffing into small openings or hard to reach r6 single_crochet 5 increase 3 times 21 places r7 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 3 3 times 24 r8 single_crochet 7 increase 3 times 27 r9 single_crochet 4 increase single_crochet 4 3 times 30 r10 single_crochet 9 increase 3 times 33 r11 single_crochet 5 increase single_crochet 5 3 times 36 r12 split the round see notes begin splitting the round by counting back 18 sts from your hook and single_crochet into the right side of that stitch r1 single_crochet 18 sts 18 r2 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 2 3 times 15 r3 single_crochet 3 decrease 3 times 12 r4 single_crochet 1 decrease single_crochet 1 3 times 9 r5 single_crochet 1 decrease 3 times 6 sew up remaining 6 sts and weave in end rejoin yarn into the next st in the original larger round continue as follows r1 single_crochet 18 sts 18 r2 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 2 3 times 15 r3 single_crochet 3 decrease 3 times 12 r4 single_crochet 1 decrease single_crochet 1 3 times 9 r5 single_crochet 1 decrease 3 times 6 sew up remaining 6 sts and weave in end © the forever hug plush shop 2025 all rights reserved forever hug bear heart accessory attachment position the heart between each arm centered in front of the belly use the same yarn that was used to make the heart and sew each side
